Detailed Description

An AMS Tracker class for the ladder specific information.

An AMS Tracker class used to put the ladder specific information in the TKDBc

author P.Zuccon -- INFN Perugia 20/11/2007

Date:
2008/01/17 PZ First version

2008/01/23 SH Some comments are added

2008/03/17 SH Some utils for MC geometry are added

2008/04/02 SH Update for alignment correction

Date
2008/10/23 10:12:39
Revision
1.11

int TkLadder::_slot
 

the slot on the layer [1-15]

the notation is that slot 1 has the largest Y coordinate. A slot can contain up to two ladders which are disposed one facing the other. Positive slot value means a ladder with electronics on the positive X side and negative slot number means a ladder with electronics on the negative X side.

Definition at line 60 of file TkLadder.h.
